# current()

**Type Method**

Provides the current absolute time.

## Declaration

```swift
static func current() -> SRAbsoluteTime
```

## Return Value

The absolute time of the current device.

## Discussion

Each device has their own absolute time. This function returns the absolute time of the [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRDevice/current] device.

## Defining the Time Range

- **from**: Fetches sample information that occurs after this time.
- **to**: Fetches sample information that occurs before this time.
- **SRAbsoluteTime**: A value that describes when the system records the data.
- **toCFAbsoluteTime()**: Converts an absolute time to a core-foundation absolute time.
